com.kousikraj.bootstrap.core
Class Bootstrap

java.lang.Object
  com.kousikraj.bootstrap.core.Bootstrap

public class Bootstrap
extends java.lang.Object

This Bootstrap class is the main class where we get the configurations from BootstrapConfigurations and the start the system state by state sequentially. This class is made Singleton because any other object related to Bootstrap will be loaded only when this object is Initialized.

Author:
KousikRaj

Method Detail

getInstance

public static Bootstrap getInstance()
Method to get the Singleton object of Bootstrap.

Returns:
Bootstrap

bootSystem

public void bootSystem()
The method that initializes the boot of the Bootstrap. This method internally calls nextState() method to load the Services sequentially as specified in bootstrap.properties file

nextState

private void nextState()
This method iterates recursively and initializes all the services as specified in bootstrap.properties file sequentially. This starts all the services only corresponding to CURRENT_STATE Also, internally this initializes the Service by invoking init() method by passing the arguments that are specified in bootstrap.properties file. If any Essential service is not loaded due to some error, then the SERVER / SYSTEM will be put to ServerState.SERVER_SERVICE_ERROR and will stop system boot and will shutdown automatically. If any Addon service is not loaded then the flag will be set as ERROR for that service and then the System will be restricted to access it.

shutDown

public void shutDown()
This method is for Shutting down all the Services that are started for the CURRENT_STATE.

getState

public ServerState getState()
This method is to return the current state of the SYSTEM/SERVER.

Returns:
ServerState
